source_sentence: 大蕃沙洲釋門教法和尚洪辯修
translation: Hong Banxiu, monk of the Śrīgupta school on Dafansa Island
Record of Merit

source_sentence: 依門神母及金光明經略述毘沙門功德天。
translation: Relying on the gate goddess mother and the Golden Light Sutra, he outlined the Vaiśravaṇa merit heaven.
It was then that the Bhagavān left Gandhamādan.
His meditative concentration was called the first nighttime division.

source_sentence: 時三十三天眾及毘沙門天王受記　下來將諸音樂香花供養世尊。
translation: The Trāyastriṃśa gods and Vaiśravaṇa received an offering. Next, they presented the Bhagavān with music, incense, and flowers.

source_sentence: 供養訖世尊即與毘沙門天王受記。
translation: After making their offerings, the Bhagavān then gave them to Vaiśravaṇa to receive their assurance.
"In the future, he'll become a buddha.

source_sentence: 號泥勿羅遮毘沙門天王。
translation: He was called Nirmāṇarati Vaiśravaṇa, the god king.

source_sentence: 得受記已即於佛前發大誓願。
translation: After receiving the assurance of Buddhahood, he then made a great vow in front of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 願我未成佛已來當作大力藥叉王。
translation: 'May I be the mighty Yakṣa King before I become a buddha.
I will protect this southern state of Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 世界一切眾生及國王大臣。
translation: All the sentient beings in the world and the king's ministers will be there.
I'll pay homage to the princes and unite the people of the land.

source_sentence: 若男若女願信受金光明。
translation: Whether male or female, may they believe in and accept the golden light.

source_sentence: 四部之眾為我轉讀於其國內所有曾覺。
translation: The four groups of people will read for me all the sentient beings in their countries.
□□□□不成人民飢餓疾病流行。
Our neighboring countries' enemies will pursue us and punish us.
Torrential rains and bad winds fail to invigorate them.
The sun and moon erode during seasons and seasons.
The stars in the wells that sound move across the land.
The people of the country are subject to suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 有如是等無量百千災怪惡事起。
translation: Countless hundreds of thousands of such calamities and bad things arise.
The Bhagavān then said that the king of those people wanted to protect his country.
The king always made it known inside the country.
He placed a single site on the ground based on sprinkled water.
He would read a single word for me.
He taught me the recitation of the Golden Light Sutra.
At the time, there were measureless hundreds of thousands of celestials and gods.
The king's old good deities and those who protected the country.

source_sentence: 及我眷屬各自隱形為作護助。
translation: My retinue and my family each took on a different form to protect and assist them.
Now, their enemies are naturally subdued.
Their grief and sickness are also removed.
All of our troops are brave and robust.
The people of the country are invited to make them happy.
The Bhagavān told them.

The then Vaiśravaṇa replied.
"The Bhagavān said.

source_sentence: 若有人王佐如是請召我時。
translation: "When a king or an officer thus summons me, suppose he asks me to come.

source_sentence: 如我不列彼處不護其王。
translation: Suppose I don't go beyond that place and don't protect the king.
May I not see my brothers in the great land.
May I refute the seven part view.

source_sentence: 未來諸佛發是誓已便歸本天。
translation: After making this vow, the future buddhas then returned to their own heaven.
When they arrived in heaven, a large crowd had gathered.

source_sentence: 阿難從座而起偏袒右肩合掌恭敬。
translation: Ānanda got up from his seat, bared his right shoulder, and put his palms together in respect.
He said to the Buddha.

At the time of the evening divisions, there were celestial flowers and incense sticking out.

source_sentence: 大蕃沙州釋門教法和尚洪辯修功德。
translation: The monk Hongbian Xiujiang, who teaches the Dharma at Śrīgarbha in Śākyamuni in Dafan, was a great virtuous man.
